name: Synergist
overview:
Synergist is a crowdsourcing site and online community for social entrepreneurs who are using business to solve societal issues.

Synergist was created out of the desire that individuals had to use business to solve social problems. Rather than wait on governments or corporations to take care of the world, they took matters into their own hands. A new generation of social entrepreneurs had been born.

Our mission is to radically improve society by supporting and empowering social movements. We believe that this new generation of social entrepreneurs has what it takes to tackle poverty, problems in education, civil rights issues, cancers, disconnectivity, environmental hazards, energy dependence, and more.

Our role in all of this? We are providing people with the tools and community they need to make an impact.

Join us on our journey to make the world a better place.
